name: Shougi Joryuu Meijin'isen
overview: Shougi Joryuu Meijini-sen is a shogi game that features different difficulty levels, 4 different backgrounds, 2 different japanese narrators, etc. The game features also an auto mode in which the player can watch and learn how to play watching the different computer movements. The game features also lessons from Naoyuki Hayashiba, Kuzita Ishida, Men Shoga, etc.
